summary: Two Khajiit followers, a Ranger and a Sword and Shield Warrior (everything\'s vanilla).
descriptionHtml:
Do\'Rahka and Raksada are two Khajiit brother, former Caravan guards, ready to become your own guards.

- DO\'RAHKA
Perks: One Handed (Sword), Block, Heavy Armor, Sneak

- RAKSADA
Perks: Archery, One Handed (Mace), Light Armor, Sneak


If you tell them to go home, they will sandbox around the spot where you ask them to leave, so don\'t forget where they are!

They\'re both Essential and can be found outside Markarth, where Ri\'Saad sets up his camp (if you have problems locating them, there\'s a picture in the screenshots).
author: overlordzetta
